explains: n. 痛苦，苦难；穷困，悲惨境遇；<英，非正式>老发牢骚的人

sentences.en: Fame brought her nothing but misery.
sentences.cn: 名声只给她带来了痛苦。

sentences.en: Flinging herself on the bed, she gave way to helpless misery.
sentences.cn: 她一头扑倒在床上，痛苦不堪。

sentences.en: All that money brought nothing but sadness and misery and tragedy.
sentences.cn: 那些钱带来的只有悲哀、苦难和不幸。
